name: BREAD VALLEY
description: Making complex word pyramid syntax crystals are some of my favorite things to think about and do. It really is not easy to locate these words that have other words within them and then combine them to create quasi-narratives or pure word abstraction. BREAD VALLEY has a unique quality from most, if not all the other word pyramids. If you look carefully in between the recessed letters, there are layers and layers of previous versions of the same text, just smaller and lighter in color (to infer distance); the space is the valley.
